bike.description: The Quad Fix frameset offers the same quality and high-end engineering as the Us Versus Them frameset: fully heat-treated frame & fork, sealed integrated headset, cut-out seat tube for large tire clearance, mid-BB, and 14mm rear axle slots. It also comes equipped with adapters for 3/8â€ axles. The Quadangle frame design is not only the most unique looking frame on the market, but it also allows for an extremely low stand-over. The forks accept pegs. Available in 3 sizes: S (47cm), M (51cm), L (56cm).
